name: Connection Detection
description:
Connection detection is a puzzle game where you have to fix circuit boards with cables and other components!

Credits:

Programming: Dotlof, ErloZim

Level Design: Dotlof

Graphics: ErloZim

Music: ErloZim

Dotlof: https://dotlof.itch.io/

ErloZim: https://dab-nation.itch.io/
